articles.title: CoinDesk Headlines
articles.full_content:
The biggest crypto news and ideas of the day.


### The Node: The Mad Journey from Terra to GENIUS


It’s bonkers to see how much the industry has changed since our annus horribilis of 2022. Perhaps a recap wouldn’t be amiss.

ByTom CarrerasJul 18, 2025


### The Node: Is Ether Back From the Dead?


The second largest cryptocurrency is showing signs of vitality for the first time in ages.

ByTom CarrerasJul 17, 2025


### The Node: The Plot to Fire Powell


The White House is tightening the screws on Jerome Powell, the chairman of the Federal Reserve.

ByTom CarrerasJul 16, 2025


### About That 'Gary Gensler for Treasury Secretary' Story


A bombshell (alleged) revelation spread fast yesterday, but was it true?

ByBenjamin SchillerAug 20, 2024


### Mass Adoption Would Ruin Crypto. Keep It a Niche


There is an unavoidable tension between the aims of decentralization and onboarding everyday users.

ByDaniel KuhnJun 14, 2024


### Trump's Appeal to Bitcoin Miners Is a Wakeup Call for Crypto to Stay Apolitical


It may seem like the industry is finally getting the political support it needs. But proceed with caution.

ByDaniel KuhnJun 12, 2024


### Be Warned, AI Crypto Scams Are on the Rise


A recent Elliptic report found five ways AI is being used to rob crypto users.

ByDaniel KuhnJun 11, 2024


### In Defense of Meme Coins


The only thing worse than meme coins is complaining about the financialization of memes.

ByDaniel KuhnJun 10, 2024


### You May Not Like It, but Casey Rodarmor Proves Bitcoin Is Permissionless


The creator of the Ordinals and Runes protocols discussed his motivations on stage at Consensus 2024.

ByDaniel KuhnJun 4, 2024


### Uniswap Vote Delay Shows DeFi Stakeholders Aren't All in It Together


The Uniswap Foundation keeps punting on a "fee switch" proposal that would give UNI governance token holders a cut of liquidity providers' revenue.

ByDaniel KuhnJun 3, 2024

articles.title: State of Crypto
articles.full_content:
Examining the intersection of cryptocurrency and government.


### State of Crypto: The Government Shutdown Nears a Record


The ongoing U.S. government shutdown may become the longest in history, with reverberating effects on crypto legislation.

ByNikhilesh DeNov 1, 2025


### State of Crypto: Skinny Master Accounts and Stablecoins


Fed. Governor Waller's proposal could boost stablecoin firms in the U.S.

ByNikhilesh DeOct 25, 2025


### State of Crypto: How to Square Decentralized Finance With Regulatory Compliance


Are these two ideas compatible? That question directed a conversation at this week's D.C. Fintech Week.

ByNikhilesh DeOct 18, 2025


### State of Crypto: Market Structure Negotiations?


A proposed regulatory framework for DeFi has the industry up in arms.

ByNikhilesh DeOct 11, 2025


### State of Crypto: What Happens to Crypto if Government Shutdown Lingers


A short-term shutdown probably won't hurt crypto's efforts in D.C. much. A long-lasting one? That's less clear.

ByNikhilesh DeOct 4, 2025


### State of Crypto: Shutdown Watch


A U.S. government shutdown won't be as bad for crypto as it might have been in previous years, but it will further delay already-stalled initiatives.

ByNikhilesh DeSep 27, 2025


### State of Crypto: ETF Listings Became Easier


Companies just need to prove they meet new generic listing standards.

ByNikhilesh DeSep 20, 2025


### State of Crypto: Congress Is Back From Break


Everyone is back from summer vacation.

ByNikhilesh DeSep 6, 2025


### State of Crypto: Unsettled U.S. Crypto Tax Scene


As Congress still struggles to work out a crypto tax approach in the U.S., the experts handling digital assets at the IRS are heading for the exits.

ByJesse HamiltonAug 30, 2025


### State of Crypto: Crypto Takes Jackson Hole


The annual SALT Wyoming conference took place this week. Government officials said a lot the industry will like.

ByNikhilesh DeAug 23, 2025

articles.title: Research Reports
articles.full_content:
Join thousands of readers who rely on CoinDesk for data-driven insights on the latest digital asset trends.


### Crypto’s Black Friday


What began as a macro-driven unwind on crypto Black Friday rapidly evolved into a market-wide stress event — underscoring how tightly coupled liquidity, collateral and oracle systems have become, writes CoinDesk Data’s Joshua de Vos.

ByJoshua de VosOct 15, 2025


### Crypto for Advisors: Crypto Treasuries, ETFs and Investments


Institutional demand and favorable policy drove Q3 crypto recovery. Ether ETF flows surpassed bitcoin. Altcoins surged as bitcoin dominance fell, marking a shift toward multi-asset institutional allocation.

ByJoshua de Vos,Kim Greenberg KlemballaOct 9, 2025
